item.title: Contract Trading Whale AguilaTrades Adds Another 9000 ETH to Short Order
item.description: On August 11th, according to on-chain analyst Ai姨 (@ai_9684xtpa), the contract transaction whale AguilaTrades once more placed a short order of 9,000 ETH, increasing the total order value to $122 million.

item.title: The ENS team multisig address has transferred approximately 142,000 ENS in the last 20 minutes.
item.description: On August 11th, according to on-chain data analyst Yu Jin, a multisig wallet of an ENS team transferred out 141,937 ENS (approximately 4.02 million) within the past 20 minutes. 72,437 ENS was transferred to FalconX and 69,500 ENS was transferred to Coinbase.

item.title: Blue Origin will accept payment in cryptocurrency such as BTC, ETH, SOL for space travel.
item.description: On August 11th, Jeff Bezos' space travel company Blue Origin will now be able to accept Bitcoin, Ethereum, SOL, USDT, and USDC for rides on its new Shepard spacecraft.

item.title: Metalpha associated address deposited 5000 ETH to Binance
item.description: On August 11th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, a wallet linked to Metalpha has just transferred 5,000 ETH to Binance (approximately $20.91 million).

item.title: James Wynn: Believes Arthur Hayes FOMO-ing is a Top Signal
item.description: August 11th witnessed James Wynn posting on social media that Arthur Hayes constantly sells at the lows and buys at the highs. Every investor is obligated to learn to think independently. No one has the ability to predict the market accurately. However, the key to making substantial profits for oneself is: always go against the mainstream. When Hayes follows the trend and enters a rally, it serves as the best signal to take a short position. No disrespect intended, but this is evidently the outcome of FOMO psychology.BlockBeats Note: James Wynn, who once held leverage positions of up to $1.2 billion on Hyperliquid and was renowned for his trading style with 40 times or even higher leverage. He has achieved significant profits (such as a $25.18 million profit from a PEPE long position) but ultimately lost $80 million and wiped out within 5 days.

item.title: Contract Trade Whale AguilaTrades Places 20,000 ETH Short Order
item.description: On August 11th, according to on-chain analyst Ai姨 (@ai_9684xtpa), when ETH dropped beneath $4200, the contract trading whale AguilaTrades placed a short order for 20,000 ETH within the [$4200 - $4240] range, which was approximately equivalent to $95.1 million.

item.title: dYdX Foundation Raises $8 Million to Accelerate Ecosystem Development
item.description: On August 11th, as per official channels, the dYdX Foundation made an announcement regarding the disbursement of 8 million US dollars in DYDX tokens from the dYdX Chain Community Treasury. This move aims to upgrade its grant program in order to accelerate the growth of the ecosystem, enhance capital efficiency, and provide scalable strategic funding support for high-impact projects. The $8 million fund will be concentrated on three key domains within the next 12 to 18 months:· Infrastructure, Development Tools, and Security System Development· Ecosystem Expansion Plan· Cutting-edge Technology Research and DevelopmentThe new program will be directly managed by the Foundation's wholly-owned subsidiary, dYdX Grants Ltd., replacing the original Grants DAO framework.

item.title: IP is down 8% after rising 3% on news of the "US Stock IP Treasury Company"
item.description: On August 11th, based on HTX market data, Story (IP) witnessed a 3% rise following the announcement on the "US Stock IP Treasury Company", and then it dropped by more than 8% and is currently priced at $6.5. After the news release, it declined by 3.3%.BlockBeats previously reported that Heritage Distilling Holding Company (NASDAQ: CASK) announced today that it has completed a $220 million private placement ($100 million in cash and $120 million in IP tokens). Heritage will raise $100 million in cash through the issuance of common stock and warrants, while receiving IP tokens from institutions such as the Story Foundation at a fixed price of $3.4 per share.

item.title: U.S. Stock Market Listed Company Heritage Distilling Completes $220 Million Private Placement to Launch IP Treasury Strategy
item.description: On August 11th, according to the report from businesswire, Heritage Distilling Holding Company (Nasdaq: CASK) announced today the completion of a $220 million private placement ($100 million in cash and $120 million in IP tokens). Participating in this placement were institutions such as Story Foundation, a16z crypto, and Amber Group to launch the world's first IP token digital asset treasury strategy.This transaction adopts a "Equity + Token" hybrid PIPE structure. Heritage will raise $100 million in cash by issuing common stock and warrants. At the same time, it will receive IP tokens from Story Foundation and other institutions at a fixed price of $3.4 per share. After the transaction, the company's treasury will hold approximately 52.5 million IP tokens (valued at $361 million based on the closing price of $6.8785 on August 10, 2025).

item.title: New 'IP Treasury Strategy' Company Heritage Distilling's Stock Price Plunges 15% in Pre-market Trading
item.description: On August 11th, according to data from rockflow (accessible at https://rockflow.ai/en/crypto-stocks?utm_campaign=blockBeats and targeted to _blank), the stock price of the newly established "IP Treasury Strategy" company, Heritage Distilling (CASK), experienced a 15% decline in pre-market trading and reached $0.59.Previously, BlockBeats reported that Heritage Distilling Holding Company (NASDAQ: CASK) announced today that it has successfully completed a $220 million private financing ($100 million in cash and $120 million in IP tokens). This financing round was led by the Story Foundation and institutional investors such as a16z crypto and Amber Group. The funds will be utilized to launch the world's first IP token digital asset treasury strategy.
